edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code

Class PPFunction

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.code.PPFunction

  • public abstract class PPFunction
extends Object
    This abstract class represents a function that the user can step through on a PPCodeTraceSlide. Concrete subclasses must define a constructor that sets the code and size of the frame. Subclasses must also override the stepThrough method.

    • Method Detail

      • stepThrough

        public abstract Object stepThrough()
        Steps through the operation of the function, indicating the points at which the user must click to continue by making calls to highlightLine. The stepThrough function returns the value of the call, which should be null for functions that have no return value.
        Returns:
        The value of the function

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Gets the name of the function.
        Returns:
        The name of the function

      • setFrameHeight

        public void setFrameHeight(double height)
        Sets the frame height for this function. Clients should call this method only if the frame height is different from that set by the slide.
        Parameters:
        height - The frame height in pixels

      • getFrameHeight

        public double getFrameHeight()
        Gets the frame height for this function.
        Returns:
        The frame height in pixels

      • setSpacing

        public void setSpacing(double spacing)
        Sets the line spacing for this function. Clients should call this method only if the line spacing is different from that set by the slide.
        Parameters:
        spacing - The line spacing in points

      • setFont

        public void setFont(String str)
        Sets the font for the code box. In this version of setFont, the font is expressed as a string in the form 
            "family-style-size"
        Parameters:
        str - A string representing the font

      • getCodeBounds

        public Rectangle2D getCodeBounds(int line,
                                 int p1,
                                 int p2)
        Returns the rectangular region that bounds the specified substring of the code line.
        Parameters:
        line - The line number
        p1 - The index of the starting character
        p2 - The index of the character following the end
        Returns:
        A Rectangle2D that encloses the code

      • getCodeBounds

        public Rectangle2D getCodeBounds(int line,
                                 String substring)
        Returns the rectangular region that bounds the first occurrence of substring on the specified line.
        Parameters:
        line - The line number
        substring - The substring you want to highlight
        Returns:
        A Rectangle2D that encloses the code

      • getCodeBounds

        substring - The substring you want to highlight
        Returns:
        A Rectangle2D that encloses the code
